statements.name: PROC CONDENSEIMAGES
statements.description: Converts wide format tables (one pixel per variable) to image tables.

arguments.name: DATA=
arguments.description: names the input data table for PROC CONDENSEIMAGES to use.

arguments.name: CAS-libref
arguments.description: refers to a collection of information that is defined in the LIBNAME statement and includes the caslib, which includes a path to the data, and a session identifier, which defaults to the active session but which can be explicitly defined in the LIBNAME statement. For more information about CAS-libref, see the section Using CAS Sessions and CAS Engine Librefs.

arguments.name: data-table
arguments.description: specifies the name of the input data table.

arguments.name: GROUPEDCHANNELS
arguments.description: specifies that the pixels of images in the input table are grouped by color.
